content: संधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To join, bring together, unite, combine, put together, compound, mix; यानि उदकेन संधीयंते तानि भक्षणीयानि <ls>Kull.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) To treat with, form friendship or alliance with, make peace with; शत्रुणा न हि संदध्यात्सुश्लिष्टेनापि संधिना <ls>H. 1. 88</ls>; <ls>Chāṇ. 19</ls>; <ls>Kām. 9. 41.</ls> ({%b%}) To unite in friendship, reconcile, make a friend of; <ls>Pt. 2. 32.</ls> {@--3@} To fix upon, direct towards; संदधे दृशमुदग्रतारकां <ls>R. 11. 69.</ls> {@--4@} To fit to or place upon the bow (as a missile, arrow &c.); धनुष्यमोघं समधत्त बाणं <ls>Ku. 3. 66</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 53</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 97.</ls> {@--5@} To produce, cause; पर्याप्तं मयि रमणीयडामरत्वं संधत्ते गगनतलप्रयाणवेगः <ls>Māl. 5. 3</ls>; सधंत्ते भृशमरतिं हि सद्वियोगः <ls>Ki. 5. 51.</ls> {@--6@} To hold out against, be a match for; शतमेकोऽपि संधत्ते प्राकारस्थो धनुर्धरः <ls>Pt. 1. 229.</ls> {@--7@} To mend, repair, heal. {@--8@} To inflict upon. {@--9@} To grasp, support, take hold of. {@--10@} To grant, yield. {@--11@} To make good, atone for. {@--12@} To contract, close up. {@--13@} To approach, come near. {@--14@} To prepare, make, compose. {@--15@} To assist, aid. {@--16@} To comprehend, conceive. {@--17@} To possess, have. {@--18@} To perform, do; <ls>Pt. 2. 11.</ls> {@--19@} To employ, make use of, apply to use.

संधा {@--1@} Union, association. {@--2@} Intimate union, close connection. {@--3@} State, condition. {@--4@} An agreement, a promise, stipulation, compact; ततार संधामिव सत्यसंधः <ls>R. 14. 52</ls>; <ls>Mv. 7. 8.</ls> {@--5@} Limit, boundary. {@--6@} Fixity, steadiness. {@--7@} Twilight. {@--8@} Distillation (for संधान <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--9@} Steady continuance in any state.
